locationPermissionDenied: To use location, enable access in your device settings.
locationUnavailable: To use location, enable access in your device settings.
locationTimeout: Your location could not be determined. Please try again later.
locationNotAccurate: The location data is inaccurate. Move to open terrain to improve accuracy.
unknownLocationErrorOccurred: Your location could not be determined. Please try again later.
choosePositionForNewAedOnMap: Select the position of the defibrillator on the map
locationPlaceholder: Schoolhouse Zurich West, next to the entrance
locationMaxLength: The location can be a maximum of 200 characters long.
descriptionMaxLength: The description can be a maximum of 200 characters long.
createAedErrorMessage: The defibrillator could not be created.
coordinatesTooltipContent: The coordinates of the defibrillator. These are automatically calculated by the marker on the map and do not need to be entered.
reporterTooltipContent: Enter your name as the reporter here. This information will not be published
locationTooltipContent: Where is this defibrillator located? Try to describe the location as precisely and accurately as possible.
indoorTooltipContent: Is this defibrillator located inside a building or is it freely accessible from the outside?
levelTooltipContent: On which floor is this defibrillator located? Tip: Ground floor is 0 in OSM.
descriptionTooltipContent: Here you can note any additional descriptions that may be useful.
openingHoursTooltipContent: Note the actual opening hours during which the defibrillator is accessible here. Please make sure to use the correct spelling as shown in the placeholder.
operatorTooltipContent: This section is for operator information so that the operator can be notified if the defibrillator has been used or is defective.
operatorPhoneTooltipContent: The operator's phone number so they can be reached as easily as possible.
accessTooltipContent: Is the defibrillator publicly accessible or only “private,” e.g., for employees?
